scripts.docs:all: yarn docs:build; yarn docs:bundle:markdown && yarn docs:bundle:html
scripts.docs:bundle:markdown: yarn typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --plugin typedoc-github-wiki-theme --out docs/markdown --entryPointStrategy merge "./**/docs/*.json"
scripts.docs:bundle:html: yarn typedoc --out docs/html --theme just-the-docs --plugin typedoc-just-the-docs-theme --plugin typedoc-plugin-rename-defaults --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --entryPointStrategy merge "./**/docs/*.json"
scripts.prepare: yarn husky:install && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt run prepare
